definition: Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on

sentences.english: People visit the Shwedagon Pagoda during the yellow robe weaving festival in Yangon, Burma (Myanmar).
sentences.chinese: 在緬甸傳統的直桑岱點燈節，人們參觀仰光大金塔。

sentences.english: Nor is known if Webb will be able to see Aung San Suu Kyi in Rangoon.
sentences.chinese: 如果韋伯也被稱爲將能夠看到在仰光昂山蘇姬。

sentences.english: For example, Taipei has four flights to Rangoon a week.
sentences.chinese: 例如，臺北和仰光之間每週有四次航班。

sentences.english: Myanmar issued on Tuesday night a curfew order in the country's biggest city of Yangon.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸昨晚在該國最年夜都會仰光公告宵禁令。

sentences.english: Eventually the monks are imprisoned inside Rangoon's former Government Technical Institute.
sentences.chinese: 最後，僧侶們被監禁在仰光的原政府技術研究院裏。

sentences.english: A woman releases fishes into the lake in Yangon, Myanmar.
sentences.chinese: 一位婦女正在往緬甸仰光的這個湖裏給魚放生。

sentences.english: Yangon had no "soul" either, when it became the capital of British Burma.
sentences.chinese: 自從成了英屬緬甸的首都，仰光也沒有了“靈魂”。

sentences.english: Ban will retain to Rangoon , where the international donors' conference will take place.
sentences.chinese: 潘先生將於週日抵達仰光，參加國際捐助者大會。

sentences.english: Relief supplies now are regularly being flown into Rangoon.
sentences.chinese: 救援物資現在能按步就班地運抵仰光。

sentences.english: Food traders join a train leaving the Burmese city of Rangoon.
sentences.chinese: 食品商販上了離開緬甸仰光市的一列火車。

sentences.english: However, a Rangoon-based journalist told The Irrawaddy that he was refused permission to talk to the survivors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一位仰光的記者說他被拒絕與倖存者交談。

sentences.english: The headquarters was also moved from Rangoon to Naypyitaw.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦鞏固發展黨總部由仰光遷往首都尼必都。

sentences.english: That Rangoon summer grew into Burma's version of a Prague spring.
sentences.chinese: 那一年，仰光之夏成爲緬甸版的布拉格之春。

sentences.english: In Rangoon, however, most voters will abstain.
sentences.chinese: 而在仰光，很多選民會選擇棄權。

sentences.english: "I looked and looked, but my name was not there, " says one Rangoon resident.
sentences.chinese: “我看了又看，但我的名字沒了，”一個仰光居民說。

sentences.english: The statement by the Rangoon-based network has been widely circulated through the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 此一聲明經仰光已通過互聯網廣爲流傳。

definition: Mandalay, province and second city of Myanmar (Burma)
Naypyidaw or Nay Pyi Taw, capital of Myanmar
another name for Mandalay 曼德勒, Myanmar's second city
Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam
